title: Nazi mods
body: So gg riot you just proved how much of a money grabbing company you are after making a thread about the whole situation of me not playing for aroung 4-5 months and then getting perma banned you deleted it, it just shows how cocky of a company you are and almost proves everysingle point that VideoGameDunkey said in his video some time ago gg, always knew that riot was mostly controlled by chinese commies.

replies.body: i was under the assumption that not playing for months didnt degrade your punishment tier, since its avoiding the problem and not reforming it

I looked into your removal history on this account and you have none.  We haven't removed any of your posts at all.

If you're referring to another account, post the name and I'll look into what happened.

Nazi mods >> money grabbing company >> Chinese communists

Somehow, these topics don't quite connect. Especially those second two.

 If someone could explain the link I'm missing, that would be greatly appreciated.
Can you link the thread you mentioned?
no, it was deleted. only riot and the threads poster can see it

yay!! a dunkey reference!!

cool story bro.
Brace yourself, the "Protect RITO's image" squad is out there and will reduce this post to -20

The full squad didn't arrive
Sorry, they're on coffee break from the last moron

>
> Brace yourself, the "Protect RITO's image" squad is out there and will reduce this post to -20

No. He Godwined and referenced Dunkey. That isn't protecting Riot's image, that's hating stupid people.
Fascist. Riot didn't systematically exterminate most of a race.
